entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json.JsonException: Reference '{#}' was not found. #99881
  • MemoryMappedFile.CreateViewAccessor throws System.UnauthorizedAccessException: Access to the path is denied. #99879
  • Missing Enum constraint on JsonNumberEnumConverter<TEnum> in reference assembly #99878
  • Android: Installed X509 certificates can't be used with SSL authentication #99874

Closed

  • The `Dispose(bool)` seems not implemented correctly #99877
    Future
  • FreeBSD 13 jail: Failed to create CoreCLR: HRESULT: 0x8007054f #99857
  • [API Proposal]: Add MonthOnly type #99751

PullRequests

Created

  • fix ping with TTL on Linux #99875
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 122.0.6261.128, windows: 122.0.6261.129 #99873
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Convert GetCurrentMethod to QCALL #99852
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Avoid using native layout info to calculate register flags for small structs where possible. #99854
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [Fix] pr-guide.md broken link to area-owners.md #99876
    area-Meta, community-contribution

Updated

  • [NativeAOT/x86] Load RtlRestoreContext dynamically and add fallback for old OSes #99813
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove invalid Unsafe.As from array helpers #99778
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ILCompiler: Fix values of IsSupported for HW intrinsics on 32-bit platforms #99753
    arch-arm32, arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • Dynamic event support #99862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fold always false type checks #99761
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fold const index access for static readonly string #99562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add additional checks to optimization of constant static field loads #99845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add an extension method to flatten the result of the combination of several IncrementalValueProviders #72578
  • Surprising boxing conversion for structure foreach collection in IOperation tree. #72577

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix #66387 SyntaxGenerator.Declaration missing interface modifiers #72576
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Bump razor EA version to accomodate serialization version bump #72575
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix excessive compilation times due to speculative parsing after an incomplete string #72565
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make sure to meld string or char constants in expression in interpolated string into adjacent literal & Use `String.Concat` if possible in interpolated string in VB #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix line endings of semantic snippets #71731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Do not return nonexistent kinds in `SyntaxFacts`' methods #72264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow VS Code to provide razor source geneator references. #72482
    Area-IDE, Community, auto-merge, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, updates #54575
  • Bug: Hard reload not triggered when navigating from Interactive page to SSR page via browser back button #54574
  • First page load or any subsequent refreshes always utilize Blazor Server, while booting WebAssembly in the background #54570

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes #54576
  • The message The value '' is not valid for #54577

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Alpine versions #54578
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump follow-redirects from 1.15.5 to 1.15.6 #54571
    area-infrastructure, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies

Updated

  • Add AddHubOptions extension on IServiceCollection #54163
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Line Shape not redraw when X2Property change with binding #21258
  • [Android] Exception after changing MainPage on App.xaml.cs from ContentPage to AppShell on runtime. #21257
  • System.TypeLoadException: Could not resolve type with token 01000004 from typeref #21256
  • MAUI Blazor - navigator.requestMediaKeySystemAccess and window.MediaKeys are undefined on Mac Catalyst #21255
  • Display a Menu when click expand button wherever in screen #21254
  • 'Platform' does not contain a definition for 'Init' #21253
  • Problem (re)applying DataTemplates generated with a DataTemplateSelector, to collection items that are added to a CollectionView after the Collection is Cleared #21252

Closed

  • iOS Publishing ignores bundle identifier and uses project name instead #21060
  • CollectionView is not currently being Garbage Collected (2) #21249
  • [regression/8.0.0] Navigating back from a TabbedPage does not invoked a destructor #17959
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Border with RoundRectangle - fix #21250
    community ✨

Merged

  • [android] fix memory leak in `TabbedPage` #21218
    platform/android 🤖, memory-leak 💦

Updated

  • Throw error when pushing without wrapping into navigation page #20155
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Enable configuring default/computed property values with a lambda expression #11001
    Backlog
  • Allow forcing a constant in query filters #25630
    Backlog
  • Disposing a "failed" pooled context throws ObjectDisposedException #33326
    9.0.0
  • Add SQL Ledger support #33226
    Backlog
  • Implement DatePart nanosecond #13481
  • Column that follows a JSON Path #33341
  • Precompiled query inner loop: source generator to warn and fail dynamic queries #32727
    9.0.0
  • Feature request: IgnoreOwnedIncludes() #33339
  • How to coalesce values when navigating nullable relationships? #33336
  • Migrations add doesn't work with Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #32835
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Change `Where_math(f)_log_new_base` queries, so they fail if `LOG()` parameters are swapped #33342

Updated

  • Implement precompiled queries #33297
